articles.title: Shang-Chi Star Gives Disappointing Sequel Update - IGN
articles.description: Shang-Chi 2 star Simu Liu has revealed the upcoming Marvel sequel will follow the next Avengers movie, which "keeps pushing back".
articles.content:
Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings star Simu Liu has given a disappointing update about the upcoming sequel.
